extension.summary: Ovaj add-on ne sadrzi nikakav sadrzaj unutar add-ona vec samo linkove koji vode do strimova. Za vise informacija [COLOR=cyan]forum[/COLOR] sat: [COLOR=limegreen]sat-albania[/COLOR].
This add-on does not contain any content within the add-on, but only the links that lead to streams. More information on [COLOR cyan]forum[/COLOR] sat: [COLOR=limegreen]sat-albania[/COLOR]
extension.description: Addon je namijenjen za Balkan Tv.[COLOR=cyan]Facebook[/COLOR] [COLOR=limegreen]Sat Albania[/COLOR]
The addon is intended for Balkan Tv.[COLOR=cyan]forum[/COLOR] [COLOR=limegreen]Sat Albania[/COLOR].
